descriptions.output_folder: output folder main path; for simplicity, please do not update
descriptions.scenario_id: number of the science scenario as per SOCs reference (scenario_number plus version index); expected format: 1 letter + 3 digits + _ + 2 digits (e.g., 'S008_01')
descriptions.trajectory: trajectory identifier, to be used together with mnemonic
descriptions.mnemonic: mnemonic of the trajectory; to be used together with trajectory
descriptions.startTime: scenario start time; timestamp in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS
descriptions.endTime: scenario end time; timestamp in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS
descriptions.main_target: object of interest (used for MAPPS output)
